name: Trigger
description: A Trigger class is a utility class to trigger events when any Entity enters an Area.

parameters.name: extent
parameters.description: Size of the Trigger. If using TriggerType.Sphere it is treated as radius, otherwise as Vector extent

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color to paint the Trigger bounds - if Visible

parameters.name: overlap_only_classes
parameters.description: Filter Trigger to only overlap specific Classes. Leave it empty for all Classes

functions.name: ForceOverlapChecking
functions.description: Forces a Overlap checking to occur, will immediately trigger overlaps

functions.name: SetExtent
functions.description: Sets the extent size of this trigger (sphere triggers can receive as float for radius)

functions.name: SetOverlapOnlyClasses
functions.description: Sets the filter to Trigger to only overlap specific Classes. Leave it empty for all Classes

events.name: BeginOverlap
events.description: Triggered when something overlaps this Trigger

events.name: EndOverlap
events.description: Triggered when something leaves this Trigger

arguments.name: entity
arguments.description: Any Actor which left the Trigger
